recipes.name: Spinach Chickpea Curry
instructions: Chop the onion and garlic.
In a pan, heat some oil and saute onion and garlic until soft.
Add cumin, red chili powder, and turmeric, stir for 1 minute.
Drain and rinse chickpeas, add to the pan.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm with rice or flatbread.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
instructions: Chop broccoli into bite-sized pieces.
Mince garlic and ginger.
Heat sesame oil in a pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add beef slices and stir-fry until browned.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, stir-fry until broccoli is tender-crisp.
Serve with hot rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Dice carrot, celery, and onion.
Crush garlic.
Heat olive oil in a pot and saute vegetables until softened.
Add chopped garlic add saute 1 minute.
Add red lentils and enough water or broth to cover.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until lentils are tender (about 20 minutes).
Season with salt and pepper.
Optional: blend slightly for smoother soup.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Foul Mudammas
instructions: Warm the cooked fava beans in a small pot until soft.
Mash lightly with a fork while leaving some beans whole.
Stir in garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and cumin.
Mix in the diced tomato and parsley.
Serve warm with pita bread.

recipes.name: Avocado Pudding Dessert
ingredients: 1/2 cup Milk, cream, or non-dairy milk
instructions: Scoop the avocado flesh into a blender.
Add milk, sweetener, vanilla, lemon juice, and salt.
Blend until smooth.
Chill 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Blackstrap Molasses Energy Bites
instructions: Mix oats, almond butter, molasses, chia seeds, and cocoa powder.
Roll into small balls.
Chill 20 minutes before eating.

recipes.name: Dark Chocolate Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds, cocoa powder, milk, and sweetener.
Stir well and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours or overnight.
Top with grated dark chocolate before serving.
